channel.title: [Release]InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey i decided to quit this project since i have already started on v2 of this. Might as well release this to the public since its just lying around in my destop. If downloading please hit the thanks button, it would be appericated. Also this isn't host ready, and somethings in the server aren't in it due to the fact that this is an old version.[/CENTER] Some bugs that i discovered were: Trading: -Players 1 trades player 2 -Both players accept -Player 2 receives the item however the item on player 1 doesn't delete Applyingdead in fightpits: -Once you are killed in fightpits you glitch out leaving your hp to 0 and the death anim goes over and over. Some mapping issue
Pics can be found [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/561405-invisionx-one-step-ahead-rest.html]here[/url]:
Download Link: [url=http://https://mega.co.nz/#!iYYTUI5I!gAy_LyW1EUD92khwlKNokYhjtnhyxOxoI_F-rIQw1NU]here[/url]

item.title: [Release]InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest
item.dc:creator: @Invision-X Invision-X
item.description:
@Invision-X wrote:

[CENTER]Hey i decided to quit this project since i have already started on v2 of this. Might as well release this to the public since its just lying around in my destop. If downloading please hit the thanks button, it would be appericated. Also this isn’t host ready, and somethings in the server aren’t in it due to the fact that this is an old version.[/CENTER]
Some bugs that i discovered were:
Trading:
-Players 1 trades player 2
-Both players accept
-Player 2 receives the item however the item on player 1 doesn’t delete
Applyingdead in fightpits:
-Once you are killed in fightpits you glitch out leaving your hp to 0 and the death anim goes over and over.
Some mapping issue

Pics can be found here:

Download Link: here

Read full topic
item.source: [Release]InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest
